mapper.insert: insert into final_member(mem_id, mem_pwd, mem_birth, mem_email, mem_profile) values(#{mem_Id}, #{mem_pwd}, #{mem_birth}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_profile})
mapper.select: select case when count(mem_Id)>0 then 1 else 0 end result from final_member where mem_Id=#{mem_Id} and mem_pwd=#{mem_pwd}
